description.value:
Ammunition any

Activate 1 Interact

Rusting ammunition is made using an ore louse's saliva and, when activated, deals damage to objects or creatures primarily made of metal. The target takes @Damage[3d8[persistent,force]] damage for up to 5 rounds. A creature that drops to 0 Hit Points while taking this persistent damage crumbles into fine powder; its gear remains. For an object, the ammunition destroys a 5-foot cube.

Craft Requirements Supply the saliva of an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.rage-of-elements-bestiary.Actor.Ore Louse]
